code: import React from'react';import{IconButton,useModal,CalculateIcon}from'@pancakeswap/uikit';import ApyCalculatorModal from'components/ApyCalculatorModal';import{useTranslation}from'contexts/Localization';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ApyButton=_ref=>{let{lpLabel,cakePrice,apr,displayApr,addLiquidityUrl}=_ref;const{t}=useTranslation();const[onPresentApyModal]=useModal(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ApyCalculatorModal,{linkLabel:t('Get %symbol%',{symbol:lpLabel}),tokenPrice:cakePrice.toNumber(),apr:apr,displayApr:displayApr,linkHref:addLiquidityUrl,isFarm:true}));const handleClickButton=event=>{event.stopPropagation();onPresentApyModal();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:handleClickButton,variant:"text",scale:"sm",ml:"4px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CalculateIcon,{width:"18px"})});};export default ApyButton;
